rawText:
Ladies and gentlemen, in a cosmic twist of fate, we’ve got the celestial tea spilling all over Chicago. Apparently, if you're planning to shop or make any important life decisions after 11 a.m. on Saturday, April 26, 2025—hold your horses! The moon has decided to throw a tantrum in Aries, and we all know how reliable astrological signs are when it comes to real-life guidance. Spoiler alert: They’re not! 

So, tread carefully, folks, especially if you have children. It seems arguments with them are on the horizon—just what we all needed to round out the day, right? Remember, if you’re banking your future on the whims of the universe, you might want to reconsider your life choices.

Hit that like button and subscribe for more astrological wisdom that’s about as solid as a house of cards! This has been PotatoHead, wasting your time as usual.
